# Sample Agent

This is a sample agent used for testing the agent discovery system.

## Purpose

This agent demonstrates the proper format for agent definition files.

## Tools

- Read: Read files from the filesystem
- Write: Create new files
- Edit: Modify existing files
- Bash: Execute shell commands
